attributes.action: Theresa May to be removed as PM and a pro Brexit  MP selected to replace her.
attributes.background:
Theresa May has failed this country and colluding with Jeremy Corbyn is the last straw. Teresa May should be removed as PM and a pro Brexit MP should replace her to lead us out of the EU ASAP.

Only someone who believes in UK and supports Brexit should lead us in this process.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
